commands.name: raid
commands.description: Find profitable raid targets within your war range
commands.details: Searches for nations within your war range that are profitable to raid. Uses cached data and real-time API calls to find the best targets based on loot potential, alliance status, and other factors.
examples: `/raid` - Find targets for your registered nation
`/raid 1500` - Find targets for a nation with 1500 score

commands.name: purge
commands.description: Find purple nations to purge for color bloc bonus
commands.details: Finds purple nations (your color bloc) that can be defeated to boost your alliance's color bonus. Targets nations with less than 15 cities, not in your alliance or top 70 alliances.

commands.name: intel
commands.description: Gather intelligence on a nation or parse intel reports
commands.details: Gathers intelligence on a nation showing their resources, money, and market values. Can also parse intel report text to extract and display the information with current market prices.
examples: `/intel` "You successfully gathered intelligence about Rishi..." - Parse intel report text
`!intel Rishi` - Get intel on nation named Rishi

commands.name: wars
commands.description: Show all wars a nation is currently in
commands.details: Displays all active wars for a nation in a neat table format. Shows resistance, fortify status, control, and turns left for each war.
examples: `/wars` - Show wars for your registered nation

commands.name: who
commands.description: Search for registered nations by name or Discord username
commands.details: Searches through registered nations to find matches by nation name, Discord display name, or exact Discord username. Useful for finding specific players or nations.
examples: `!who Rishi` - Search for nations with 'Rishi' in the name

commands.name: spies
commands.description: Audit a nation's spy compliance
commands.details: Checks if a nation has the required number of spies based on their CIA project status. Compares current spies with yesterday's count to detect spy purchases.

commands.name: networth
commands.description: Show a nation's resource chest (networth)
commands.details: Displays a nation's current resource amounts including money, raw materials, and manufactured goods. Shows total value and individual resource counts.
examples: `/networth` - Show resources for your registered nation

commands.name: warchest
commands.description: Calculate a nation's warchest requirements (5 days of upkeep)
commands.details: Calculates how much money and resources a nation needs to maintain their military for 5 days. Useful for planning war preparations and resource management.

commands.name: military
commands.description: Check a nation's military capacity and usage
commands.details: Shows detailed military information including unit counts, military capacity usage, and readiness status. Helps assess military strength and planning.

commands.name: mmr
commands.description: Check a nation's MMR (Military Management Rating) status
commands.details: Displays a nation's Military Management Rating which indicates how efficiently they manage their military forces. Higher ratings mean better military management.

commands.name: chest
commands.description: Show the current amount of resources on a nation
commands.details: Displays a nation's current resource stockpile including all raw materials and manufactured goods. Shows both individual amounts and total value.
examples: `/chest` - Show resources for your registered nation

commands.name: register
commands.description: Register your Discord account with a nation
commands.details: Links your Discord account to a Politics and War nation. This allows you to use commands without specifying a nation ID each time.

commands.name: rpt
commands.description: Send a message as the bot (admin only)
commands.details: Allows admins to send messages as the bot. Can optionally reply to a specific message by providing the message ID.
examples: `/rpt Hello everyone!` - Send a simple message
`/rpt This is a reply 123456789012345678` - Reply to a message

commands.name: update_raid_cache
commands.description: Update raid cache with latest data (admin only)
commands.details: Forces an immediate update of the raid cache with the latest data from the Politics and War API. Useful for ensuring data is current.

commands.name: defcon
commands.description: Set the bot to DEFCON mode (admin only)
commands.details: Sets the bot to DEFCON mode for emergency situations. Only available to administrators and requires specific permissions.

commands.name: audit
commands.description: Audit alliance members for various compliance issues (Must be Officer)
commands.details: Performs comprehensive audits on alliance members including spy compliance, military readiness, and other important metrics.

commands.name: bank
commands.description: Check alliance bank balance
commands.details: Displays the current alliance bank balance including money and resources. Shows total value and individual resource amounts.

commands.name: war
commands.description: Show active wars for a nation
commands.details: Shows all active wars for a specific nation including offensive and defensive wars. Displays war details and status.

commands.name: warstatus
commands.description: Check war status and detection
commands.details: Checks the current war status and detection systems. Useful for monitoring war-related activities and system status.

commands.name: clearwars
commands.description: Clear war data and reset war tracking
commands.details: Clears stored war data and resets war tracking systems. Useful for maintenance and data management.

commands.name: market
commands.description: Get current market prices for resources or calculate costs
commands.details: Shows current market prices for resources from the Politics & War trade market. Can show all resources, a specific one, or calculate total costs for specified quantities. Supports abbreviations (c for coal, u for uranium, etc.) and full names. Use 'cost' with quantities like 'aluminum:50 u:100' to calculate total costs.
examples: `!market cost aluminum:50 u:100` - Calculate cost for 50 aluminum and 100 uranium
`/market` with quantities - Calculate costs using slash command

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Check the bot's latency
commands.details: Checks the bot's current latency and response time. Useful for troubleshooting connection issues.

commands.name: help
commands.description: Get help with bot commands
commands.details: Provides help and information about bot commands. Can search for specific commands or show general help.
examples: `/help raid` - Get help with raid command

commands.name: suggest
commands.description: Suggest something to the bot
commands.details: Submit suggestions for bot improvements or new features. Your feedback helps make the bot better.
examples: `/suggest Add a new command for alliance management` - Submit a suggestion

commands.name: report-a-bug
commands.description: Report a bug to the bot
commands.details: Report bugs or issues you encounter with the bot. Include as much detail as possible to help fix the problem.
examples: `/report-a-bug The raid command is not working properly` - Report a bug

nation.name: Nation Commands
nation.description: Commands for gathering information about nations and finding targets

alliance.name: Alliance Commands
alliance.description: Commands for managing and auditing alliances

user.name: User Commands
user.description: Commands for managing your Discord account and settings

war.name: War Commands
war.description: Commands for war detection, analysis, and management

general.description: Raiden Shogun is a comprehensive Politics and War Discord bot that helps with raiding, intelligence gathering, alliance management, and more.
general.support: For support, contact <@860564164828725299> or check the documentation.
